params.taskDescription:
Given: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>

</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p</annotation></semantics></math>: Kermit is a green frog; translate <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mtext>~</mtext>
  <mi>p</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text~p</annotation></semantics></math> into words.
